data.title: Stick with the classics!!
data.body:
One of the best things about them is their easy-to-read design, making them perfect for any game night. Plus, they're built to last, so you can count on them to withstand countless shuffles and games.
And let's not forget the value ‚Äì you get top-notch quality without breaking the bank.
Personally, I've been using these cards since I was a kid, and every time I've tried going cheaper, I've regretted it. LOL Stick with the classics ‚Äì you won't be disappointed! üÉèüëå

data.title: Good quality
data.body: Nice quality cards for the money. Have used several months and no problems.

data.title: Great Product!
data.body: Great price for these playing cards! Good quality too :)

data.title: Nothing beats a classic
data.body: Bicycle playing cards are a classic choice known for their quality and durability. The air-cushion finish ensures smooth shuffling and dealing, making them popular among card enthusiasts. The iconic Rider Back design is simple yet timeless. While they might not have flashy features, their reliability and versatility make Bicycle cards a staple for card games and magic tricks alike.

data.title: Terrific Value when purchased on an Amazon promotion
data.body:
They are simple playing cards. However, to receive the industry standard Bicycle cards at the discounted price was amazing. The cards are sturdy and throwbacks to my youth, playing card games, on The Farm, with Grandpa.

Blessings

data.title: Bicycle Riding cards - standard pack
data.body:
As some of us know who have played cards since they were young, we have used this card brand since forever. This is one of the many products that has continued to keep its standards high for their product. Thank you! I truly appreciate that.
The cards were in a cellophane wrapper and were just like I remembered them, clean, new, and packed well.
I will definitely buy these again!

data.title: Exactly what you would expect, quality cards for a fair price
data.body: Your standard card set for poker night or any other card games. They are quality are a great price. Clean cuts and bright colors, they are exactly what you would expect from Bicycle cards. We find this particularly great to use with kids for memory games or to teach them basic card games, even just ‚Äúwar‚Äù on what card is higher. Of course the two colors make great sense on poker night to always have a deck shuffling. Great product here for a fair price.

data.title: Awesome !
data.body: Perfect, exactly what I wanted, well packaged and fast delivery ! Thank you so much !

data.title: These are very good cards.
data.body:
Our card club needed new cards. We play a card game 3 to 4 times a week at our clubhouse. When cards are used that often they tend to get worn out quickly especially if they are inexpensive.

We decided to buy the bicycle brand as I remember my grandparents using them forever.

When they arrived I opened them and they were quite slippery when tying to shuffle. I remembered reading that a little talc would help the new cards be easier to handle. We also decided to purchase a card shuffler which works great with the new cards.

Our card players are happy with our new bicycle cards and are voting to purchase more for the club.

data.title: Standard 2 Deck playing cards in red and blue backs.
data.body:
These are the standard in playing cards. They are a bit slippery right out of the box, however my automatic shuffler did well with them in any case.

They include 2 jokers

They also have 2 extra cards per deck: one with a link to the Bicycle site with rules to dozens of playing card games and one pointing to the companies social media sites - these cards do not have standard backs can could not substitute for extra jokers which is too bad - because then you could use them for canasta.

data.title: Nice cards
data.body: These are the standard in cards. No other brand has the feel and durability of these. I've used other flimsy cards and I don't like them as well as these. The cost isn't that much different over other brands. I've seen some in big box stores but I just didn't need that many sets.

data.title: Well made
data.body: The card set is well made and work well.In my case I had to buy 2 sets.I needed 2 decks of the same color for replacing a double set of same colored cards that were worn out.The manufacturer of the game didn‚Äôt sell replacements.So it would have been nice if I had that option when ordering the new cards. It‚Äôs all good I have some spare cards now LOL.

data.title: Plain as day
data.body:
You need some plain playing cards? Here you go. They don't have Luke Skywalker or Pok√©mon on them. They are not fancy in the slightest. But they be cards. They are easy to deal and you don't feel like you're going to lose your mind when your kid loses the 3 of hearts somewhere in the bathroom. Good cards for cheap!
